original_text: And they slaughtered the Passover lamb on the fourteenth day of the second month. And the priests and the Levites were ashamed, so that they consecrated themselves and brought burnt offerings into the house of the Lord.
korean_text: 둘째 달 열넷째 날에 유월절 양을 잡으니 제사장과 레위 사람이 부끄러워하여 성결하게 하고 번제물을 가지고 여호와의 전에 이르러

sentences.original_text: And they slaughtered the Passover lamb
on the fourteenth day of the second month.
And the priests and the Levites were ashamed,
into the house of the Lord.
